links.title: 2 Reasons Why The Stock Market Is Falling- It Ain't Trade War Fears
links.description: The markets sure moves fast these days, the S&P 500 was down by nearly 6 percent this week! $1.1 trillion in market cap wiped off the S&P 500 over the past two days, and $1.5 trillion for the week! So you think the trade wars totals will amount to that much?

messages.body: 4 Things To Watch In The Stock Market For The Week Of March 26 $spy $ibb $xlk $xlf $amzn $fb $aapl $nflx $mu $googl https://mottcapitalmanagement.com/4-things-to-watch-in-the-stock-market-for-the-week-of-march-26/

links.title: 4 Things To Watch In The Stock Market For The Week Of March 26
links.description: It will undoubtedly be an interesting week, especially with the quarter end on Thursday, remember the markets are closed on Friday for Good Friday. The Eurekahedge 50, an index that measures the top 50 hedge funds, was up only 1.15 percent for the year at the end of February, and that was trailing the S&P 500 total return index of 1.83 percent.

links.title: How Apple And The FANG Stocks Fared This Week
links.description: Facebook and Amazon both lost $75 billion in market cap last week. While Amazon and Netflix also declined last week they have added $158 and $47 billion for the year, respectively. Apple fell but its much lower valuation should provide some support.

links.title: Apple CEO Tim Cook on Facebook data leak: Regulation is necessary
links.description: Facebook's data leak sent the company stock ( FB) plunging more than 10% in the past week and raised heated debate on the tech company's privacy policy and whether it - and other firms that collect user data - should be more heavily regulated.
